caption.title: Clustering levels.
caption.p: Generated versions of the country for various κ. Upper left: No clustering. Upper center: κ = 0.1. Upper right: κ = 0.2. Middle left: κ = 0.5. Middle center: κ = 0.8. Middle right: κ = 1.0. Bottom left: κ = 1.5. Bottom center: κ = 2.0. Bottom right: κ = 3.0.
